meanings.definition: Olivenites (noun): a mineral consisting of arsenic and copper sulfide
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a rare olivenites specimen during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered olivenites in the deep underground caves.
meanings.sent3: The olivenites mineral sparkled like tiny jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of olivenites minerals was a treasure trove of colors.
meanings.sent5: The olivenites mineral gleamed with a unique green hue.

meanings.definition: Olivenites (adjective): relating to or characteristic of olivenite minerals
meanings.sent1: The olivenites characteristics made it easy to identify the mineral.
meanings.sent2: The olivenites properties were distinct from other minerals in the collection.
meanings.sent3: She decorated her room with olivenites-themed artwork and colors.
meanings.sent4: The olivenites essence filled the room with a sense of nature.
meanings.sent5: The olivenites pattern on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.
